docs.lead_paragraph: The Phillies dominated the East in the summer of 1977 with best record in the league, and the best anywhere this side of Kansas City. But for the second year in a row they lost the playoff, so they are now shooting for their third straight division title and first pennant in 29 seasons.

docs.lead_paragraph: Richard Kavanaugh isn't likely to forget the circumstances of his Broadway debut. For one thing, he's acting in the highly successful revival of "Dracula," the hoary theatrical thriller that has confounded the odds makers by settling into the Martin Beck Theater for what will obviously be a comfortably long run.
